sourcesContent:
Top ten vacancies with the highest salary:

  • {{vacancy.name}}

    Salary: {{vacancy.salary}}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Vacancy } from '../models'; import { VacancyService } from '../vacancy.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-vacancy-top-ten', templateUrl: './vacancy-top-ten.component.html', styleUrls: ['./vacancy-top-ten.component.css'] }) export class VacancyTopTenComponent implements OnInit{ vacancies: Vacancy[] = []; constructor(private service: VacancyService){} ngOnInit(): void{ this.service.getTopVacancies().subscribe((vacancies)=>{ this.vacancies = vacancies }) } }
